  • Check

I wanted my emojis to look the same across all platforms so I included twemoji! ðŸ˜Š Though the way Iâ€™m implementing them might make the page slow down ðŸ˜” If only the twemoji gem worked in GH Pagesâ€¦ ðŸ¥º

A term
its definition?
Iâ€™m not really sure of what this is

You can click on images to view them in a new tab. If the image comes from an specific source (like a twitter post) clicking on it will lead you to said post instead

This is a blockquote! Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, did you know that fish only have two heart chambers? That means that the blood flows through all of the body before being pumped by the heart again, unlike in us mammals where the blood is pumped twice per cycle

:O

This is the end of the post! Below is the footnote and a Disqus comment section. I donâ€™t like Disqus and Iâ€™ve tried disabling its ads but it was the only free comment section that didnâ€™t force you to log in even to leave anonymous messages (like Commentbox)
